THE PROPERTY Off HIS 3RITAMIC MA JESTY* S O0V^IOTJ^);)BORE T, Copy Mo. )CABINET. *JTURKISH ARMY.Note by the Secretary of State for War.I circulate to the Cabinet for consideration the following telegram from General Milne,(Initialled) W.S.C.WAR OFFICE S3, May 2601930;CLEAR THE LINE.From:- General Milne, Constantinople. To; War Office.Desp. 25.5.20.Reed, 25.5.20.1.8660 - May 25th*Hamad Ferids as Turkish War Minister, has requested to be allowed to enrol and equip Turkish troops up to ? number authorised in the draft fieace Treaty, namely 15,000 regulars and 35,000 gendarmes with a view to re-establishing the consultants authority over certain areas at present occupied by ? rebel forces This is a matter of such importance that I refer it to you for the consideration of Supreme Council.0O0
